fields.name: Subalignments:
fields.value: Woodwind, Brass, Percussion, String, Digital, Vocal, Special

fields.name: Features:
fields.value:
- Factional chat
- No factional kill
- The Band's Concert begins on day X and is announced to the Town. X is 4 if there's only one living member, 5 if there's two, 8 if there's three, 10 if there's four, and 12 if there's five or more. 
- Once the Concert begins, all non-Band players will be roleblocked through immunity the following night, there is no lynch that day, the Band may anonymously lynch a player if all members unanimously agree, and for the rest of the game, all Band members gain Basic defense and their abilities are enhanced.
- If the Concert hasn't started and its starting day would be reduced to a day that's already past, it starts the next available day instead.
- Rehearsing makes the Concert start one day earlier, but notifies half of the other players at random within the rehearser's rehearsal radius of them on the player list that someone was rehearsing near them.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Ensure the removal of those who will not listen to your music.
